languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, авгуры засекли корабли эльдаров — боя не избежать! Опытные офицеры советуют сбивать многозарядные щиты ксеносов серией последовательных атак".
"Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, авгуры засекли корабли эльдаров — боя не избежать! Опытные офицеры советуют сбивать многозарядные щиты ксеносов серией последовательных атак".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

"Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

languages.text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵发现了艾达灵族的舰船！战斗马上就要爆发了！我们经验丰富的军官建议我们发动连续炮击，击穿他们的多重充能护盾。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵发现了艾达灵族的舰船！战斗马上就要爆发了！我们经验丰富的军官建议我们发动连续炮击，击穿他们的多重充能护盾。”

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, die Auguren haben Aeldari-Schiffe entdeckt! Es wird einen Kampf geben! Unsere etwas erfahreneren Offiziere raten dazu, ihre Mehrfachschilde mit einer Reihe aufeinanderfolgende Angriffe zu durchdringen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, die Auguren haben Aeldari-Schiffe entdeckt! Es wird einen Kampf geben! Unsere etwas erfahreneren Offiziere raten dazu, ihre Mehrfachschilde mit einer Reihe aufeinanderfolgende Angriffe zu durchdringen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les augures ont détecté des vaisseaux aeldaris ! L'affrontement est imminent ! Nos officiers les plus expérimentés recommandent de lancer une série d'attaques consécutives pour tenter de briser leurs boucliers multicharge. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les augures ont détecté des vaisseaux aeldaris ! L'affrontement est imminent ! Nos officiers les plus expérimentés recommandent de lancer une série d'attaques consécutives pour tenter de briser leurs boucliers multicharge. »

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, los augures han detectado naves Aeldari! ¡El combate es inminente! Nuestros oficiales más experimentados recomiendan atravesar sus múltiples cargas de escudos con una serie de ataques consecutivos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, los augures han detectado naves Aeldari! ¡El combate es inminente! Nuestros oficiales más experimentados recomiendan atravesar sus múltiples cargas de escudos con una serie de ataques consecutivos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、オーガーがアエルダリの船を発見しました！戦闘が迫っています！経験豊富な士官達は、連続攻撃でマルチチャージシールドを貫けと助言しています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、オーガーがアエルダリの船を発見しました！戦闘が迫っています！経験豊富な士官達は、連続攻撃でマルチチャージシールドを貫けと助言しています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Alametler, Aeldari gemileri saptadı! Çatışma kaçınılmaz! Deneyimli subaylarımız, çok şarjlı kalkanlarını bir dizi arka arkaya saldırıyla yarmayı tavsiye ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augurs have detected Aeldari ships! Combat is imminent! Our more experienced officers advise piercing their multi-charge shields with a series of consecutive attacks."
